title: EU chief hails centre-left win in Portugal presidential vote
summary_full: Antonio Jose Seguro scored a convincing win over far-right rival Andre Ventura in the country's election on Sunday
summary_public: Antonio Jose Seguro scored a convincing win over far-right rival Andre Ventura in the country's election on Sunday
